page.title: 12SMOKING
page.content: In our survey we discovered that the vast majority of people in this area who are entitled to smoke tobacco (people over sixteen years of age) do not. Many gave their reasons such as the huge publicity which has been around in recent years concerning the terrible damage which the tar causes to internal organs and the scare of cancer. It has now become unfashionable to smoke particularly among the young. They now see it for the revolting habit it is. No longer are modern film stars seen with a cigarette between their lips as Bogart used to do. This is the reason that many pensioners and older people smoke. It is now no longer the 'in' thing to do.
